definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: Commercial press-release distribution services are also used to distribute news releases.
sentences.chinese: 商業新聞發佈分銷服務也被用來散佈新聞稿。

sentences.english: Will DuPont's strategy enable meaningful market share recovery?
sentences.chinese: 杜邦的玉米種分銷戰略能夠恢復其市場份額嗎？

sentences.english: The chapter 3 demonstrates the mode transformation course of TCL white household electrical appliance distributing channel.
sentences.chinese: 第3章是分析TCL白家電渠道分銷模式的演變過程。

sentences.english: It can apply to whole supply chains and distribution networks.
sentences.chinese: 它各一運用在整個供應鏈和分銷網絡中。

sentences.english: Algae-based fuel can be added directly into existing refining and distribution systems;
sentences.chinese: 藻類燃料可以直接添加進當前的提煉和分銷系統。

sentences.english: AAE is the perfect place to find products for our own brand and distribute in Australia.
sentences.chinese: AAE爲我們的品牌找到產品，並能分銷在澳洲。

sentences.english: We have a number of outlets throughout the country.
sentences.chinese: 我們在全國各地設有分銷店。

sentences.english: Of course, these are digital distributors talking here.
sentences.chinese: 當然，這僅僅是數字漫畫分銷商的一面之詞。

sentences.english: The printers and distributors of the magazine had their windows smashed.
sentences.chinese: 雜誌印刷商和分銷商家的窗戶都被人砸破了。

sentences.english: Normally, the Reseller has enough widgets in inventory to fulfill the customer order.
sentences.chinese: 一般而言，分銷商的庫存能夠滿足客戶的訂購需求。

sentences.english: TVI's growing team of Independent Distributors is the key to its success.
sentences.chinese: 積分日益增長的團隊獨立分銷商是其成功的關鍵所在。

sentences.english: Deletes the incoming purchase order sent by the Reseller.
sentences.chinese: 刪除分銷商發送來的購買訂單。

sentences.english: If you avoid these pitfalls, your MLM distributor business should be successful.
sentences.chinese: 如果你避免這些陷阱，你應該傳銷分銷業務成功。

sentences.english: Yahoo! is expanding its distribution network to include you.
sentences.chinese: 雅虎正在擴展廣告分銷，並使之惠澤到您。

sentences.english: I work as the financial director of a distribution company in Dublin.
sentences.chinese: 我作爲一個分銷公司財務總監在都柏林工作。

definition: to sell/to sell on commission/to distribute
e-commerce (abbr. for 電子商務|电子商务[dian4 zi3 shang1 wu4])/(old) to negotiate by telegram or telephone
running/operation (of airport, bus service, business etc)
to procure (for an enterprise etc)/to purchase
